code: // ------------------------------------------------------------------------ @Override public Long getValue() {     final JobStatus status = eg.getState().     if (status == JobStatus.RUNNING) {         // running right now - report the uptime         final long runningTimestamp = eg.getStatusTimestamp(JobStatus.RUNNING).         // we use 'Math.max' here to avoid negative timestamps when clocks change         return Math.max(System.currentTimeMillis() - runningTimestamp, 0).     } else if (status.isTerminalState()) {         // not running any more -> finished or not on leader         return NO_LONGER_RUNNING.     } else {         // not yet running or not up at the moment         return 0L.     } }
